name: Freefall (itch) (VSPDEV)
description:
"COMRADE,

            Our Defences have detected that

            there are radioactive packages been dropped along with food packages

            The size of radioactive packages is small but due to Freefall they drop with

             same speed as other packages.

You need to go and destroy red packages. Do not destroy other packages

I repeat 'DO NOT DESTROY OTHER PACKAGES'"

Freefall is a fun, Fast Paced game where you have to use magnetic power to destroy

radioactive packages before they explode, avoid other packges been detroyed.

Made for Indie Teens Game Jam :D
